description: This file defines the PDFBytesKnowledgeBase class, which manages a collection of PDF byte streams and provides methods to asynchronously and synchronously extract documents from them.

classes.name: PDFBytesKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages PDF byte streams and provides methods to extract documents synchronously and asynchronously.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Synchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects extracted from each PDF byte stream.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects extracted from each PDF byte stream.
